FAQs

Who was John Wayne?

John Wayne was an American actor, producer, director, born on 26 May, 1907 in Winterset, Iowa, United States.

When did John Wayne pass away?

John Wayne passed away on June 11, 1979.

What was the cause of death?

The cause of John Wayneâs death was Stomach cancer.

How old was John Wayne at the time of death?

John Wayne was 44 years old when he passed away.
